articles.author: Ava Wallace
articles.title: Coco Gauff tops Aryna Sabalenka to give the French Open an American champion - The Washington Post
articles.description: With the win, Gauff became the first American champion in Paris, woman or man, since Serena Williams in 2015.
articles.content: Tennis fans have grown accustomed to American champions who dictate. Serena Williams revolutionized womens tennis with her powerful game and unmatched serve that gave her the immediate upper hand in … [+4272 chars]
